info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 3:25PM MDT until July 13 at 4:00PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: The National Weather Service in Aberdeen has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Hamlin County in northeastern South Dakota... Southeastern Clark County in northeastern South Dakota... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 425 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Willow Lake, or 8 miles west of Bryant, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Bryant. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
